list.name: HONEY-MOLASSES
list.description: Bea drops a beehive with a splash of sticky honey around it. The honey slows down enemies that step in it.
list.descriptionHtml: Bea drops a beehive with a splash of sticky honey around it. The honey slows down enemies that step in it.

list.name: RATTLED-HIVE
list.description: Bea unleashes x angry bees that circle away from her, dealing more damage the further they go (up to x damage).
list.descriptionHtml: Bea unleashes x angry bees that circle away from her, dealing more damage the further they go (up to x damage).
